name: SlumberTop
overview:
The Slumber Top memory foam mattresses topper provides a comfortable solution to stiff sleepless nights. Unlike normal mattresses the Slumber Top is made from Visco-elastic polyurethane, which provides excellent therapeutic support, has no motion transfer, and correctly aligns the back and neck to reduce stiffness. This mattress topper moulds to the body and provides therapeutic support no matter whatever way one sleeps. A good night’s sleep is the key to a successful healthy day and Slumber Top Ltd. is committed to providing New Zealand with a high quality product that assists in sleep aid.

It is essential for the body to reach the REM (Rapid Eye Movement) stage of sleep to get fully rested and re-energised for the upcoming day. Uncomfortable mattresses cause a disturbed sleep, prohibiting one from ever reaching the REM stage of sleep. The Slumber Top Memory Foam topper is easy to keep clean and has a hypo-allergenic jacquard outer cover zippered for easy removal and washing.

All Slumber Top mattresses are covered by a 5 year Manufacturer’s Warranty which ensures each mattress is in mint condition and has no faulty material subject to normal use. Slumber Top Ltd. is directed by Rudi Gitmans who has over 40 years of experience in the textile industry and fully believes in the importance of customer satisfaction and excellent customer service.
